snippet: The president appeared to use the 150th anniversary of the amendment abolishing slavery to challenge the anti-Muslim politics espoused by the Republican candidate.
abstract: Pres Obama, seizing on 150th anniversary of Constitutional amendment ending slavery, calls on all Americans to reject bigotry and continue fighting for equality; comments are seen as indirect rejection of Donald J Trump's call to bar Muslims from emigrating to the United States.
lead_paragraph: The president appeared to use the 150th anniversary of the amendment abolishing slavery to challenge the anti-Muslim politics espoused by the Republican candidate.

headline.main: Obama Calls for End to Bigotry, in Implicit Rebuke of Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Eye on Trump, Obama Calls for an End to Bigotry
